data.title: Visit Kino 99 Kolín in Kolín
data.meta_description:
### Discover the Magic of Kino 99 Kolín in Kolín

If you're a movie enthusiast or simply looking for a unique experience in Kolín, then Kino 99 is the place to be. This charming cinema is located in the heart of the city and offers a delightful escape for locals and tourists alike. Let's dive into the captivating world of Kino 99 Kolín and explore what makes it a must-visit destination.

### A Cinematic Delight

Kino 99 Kolín boasts two halls that cater to different audience sizes. The large hall can accommodate up to 233 spectators, while the small hall offers a cozy setting for 65 moviegoers. Both rooms are wheelchair accessible, ensuring that everyone can enjoy the magic of the silver screen.

### Cutting-Edge Technology

One of the highlights of Kino 99 Kolín is its state-of-the-art stereo 3D projection system, RealD. This technology enhances the movie-watching experience, immersing viewers in a world of stunning visuals and lifelike depth. Whether you're watching an action-packed blockbuster or a heartwarming drama, the quality of the projection will leave you in awe.

### Convenient Ticketing Options

Gone are the days of waiting in long queues to purchase movie tickets. Kino 99 Kolín offers the convenience of online ticket sales and bookings through their website, [kino99.cz](http://kino99.cz). Simply visit the website, select your preferred movie and showtime, and secure your seats with a few clicks. You can even choose to receive your tickets digitally on your mobile phone, eliminating the need for printing.

### Explore Kolín

While you're in Kolín, take the opportunity to explore the city's rich history and vibrant culture. Visit the stunning St. Bartholomew's Church, a Gothic masterpiece that dates back to the 14th century. Wander through the charming streets of the Old Town, lined with colorful buildings and quaint shops. Don't forget to indulge in the local cuisine, with traditional Czech dishes like goulash and svíčková on the menu.

### When to Visit

Kino 99 Kolín operates throughout the year, offering a diverse selection of movies for all tastes. Whether you're visiting during the summer or winter, you can always find a captivating film to enjoy. Keep an eye out for special screenings and events that may be happening during your visit, as Kino 99 often hosts film festivals and premieres.

### Conclusion

Kino 99 Kolín is more than just a cinema; it's a gateway to a world of imagination and entertainment. With its cutting-edge technology, convenient ticketing options, and prime location in Kolín, this cinema is a must-visit for movie lovers. So, the next time you find yourself in Kolín, make sure to catch a film at Kino 99 and immerse yourself in the magic of the silver screen.
